name: Ronin Koleo
description:
Ronin Koleo is a plattforming and action game inspired in 90’s titles, but its gameplay and controls were adapted to mobile standards. You’ll control Koleo, the main character, whose main mechanic is to run without stopping. This will challenge your attention since you’ll be dodging obstacles and defeating enemies throughout the game. The adventure features more than 60 levels distributed on 7 worlds, each world ends with an exciting boss battle that will test both your strength and ability.

Created by Golden Pie Studios

For Android and iOS. Created with Unity

I worked some level design for this game.

Please review it in the store if you check it out, thanks.
